title_short: (08519) Bosc La Riba parking and activities
description: We are Bosc la Riba, by Mas La Riba, a family business based on cattle breeding and the forestry sector. We open the doors of our farm to you to offer you leisure and sports activities in nature, within our property. Visits to the farm and its surroundings. We allow overnight stays in our Visitors Parking. Starting point of the Tavertet GR2 hike. Distance from the Sau dam 900 m in the area of Pineda Xica and 1,400 m in the esplai pantà area of Sau i Club Nautico Vic-Sau. We have 8 electrical connection points, a water source and a dry toilet. Water loading and unloading services in the city area (7 km). Good access and flat. Privileged location! With CCTV.

description: Name: MAS CASABLANCA, Type: Furgoperfecto, Free: No -, Drinking water: Yes, WC: Yes, 41°52'50.2"N 2°17'13.9"E 41.880618, 2.287201 Description of the area: The area for vans and caravans, is the parking that is part of the farm facilities there. The farm has been open for years for visits. There is a picnic area with tables and benches. The site is beautiful and at the same time quiet, it is very close to the Montseny routes and very well connected with the rest of the region. Just 6 km from Vic. It is easily accessible with any vehicle. You can spend the night. In order to spend the night, it is mandatory to do one of the types of visits they make to the farm, free or guided. A visit to the farm is highly recommended. Before you go, call to see if it's open and they have a seat.

title: (08551) Tona - 4 Carrer Andreu Santasmasas
description: We are Miquel & family, we are travelers with a Van, and we offer secure Storage parking (with 24/7 video) and private external parking at our house. If you need to interrupt your trip, you can leave your vehicle (NOT stay overnight) for 1 week, or even 12 months. Available for Camper, RV motorhomes, Van, small trucks (max. 8m long and 3m high). We can also transfer you to Barcelona or Girona airport in 45min. Displacement apart) . We have a plastic cover for your van. It has the possibility of electricity and water tank with extra cost. We also have an Airb&b for accommodation at home: "a little piece of heaven" Tona-Catalonia (Barcelona) We are waiting for you and your adventures!

description: Sólo acceso en 4x4: lugar tranquilo y amplio con vistas a la montaña. Llega señal de móvil y no pasa mucha gente (únicamente algún ciclista)

description: Small flat area ideal for a quiet night's sleep and visit the "Bufadors of Bevi" area. The path of the excursion begins about 2 km from the place of the night, but it is recommended to spend the night here, to be a flat area and having a picnic table.

title: (08551) Tona - 27 Avinguda Riambau
description: Unpaved parking area that is used as parking for the climb to the Tona Castle. It is separated from the town, with the Hermitage of Lourdes next to it. It has views but there is no shade. Easy access for motorhomes and campers.

title: (08551) Tona - 52 Carrer Antoni Figueras
description: Ample parking perfect for visiting Tona. spending a night is prohibited

title: (17510) Llaés -
description: Parking where some excursions depart from. About 3 or 4 vans fit. Although it is next to the race, it is a super quiet road. No services.

title: (08550) Sant Miquel de Balenyà - 21 BV-5303
description: Train station parking

title: (08553) Seva - BV-5303
description: Recovery for van, small platform by the roadside. Little traffic (a winter weekend of confinement). Shaded, and clear view. Further down along the path, there are other flat pitches, to be avoided if it is wet.

title: (08554) Seva - 13 Camí de Tona
description:
Large esplanade of land, ideal for parking and spending the night. No services. There is the
train station, from 11:00 p.m. to 6:00 a.m. no trains passed.

title: (17176) Juanetas - 162 Carretera Joanetes
description: By parking next to a restaurant, quiet to spend the night, there is no electricity, but it is a good place, surrounded by nature

title: (17405) Espinelves - GV-5441
description: Parking to visit the Masjoan arboretum

title: (17177) Els Hostalets d'en Bas - 105 Lloc Hostalets Bas
title_short: (17177) Els Hostalets d'en Bas - 105 Lloc Hostalets Bas
description: Roadside parking at the entrance to various hiking trails

title: (17510) Ripoll - Camí de Llaés
description: Petit prat on the coast of the Vallfogona stream. No hi hem passat la nit perquè l'hem descobert just després d'haver passat la nit in an altre park4night to the mateixa road. The road is a rural path and practically no traffic.

title: (17405) Espinelves - 18 Carrer de Vic
description: Superb area where you can  visit this beautiful village of Les Guilleries. Very quiet place, located at the entrance of the village. There are two parking areas, located on both sides of the street, although I recommend the one on the left, to facilitate access and range (it's an old football field).

title: (08553) Seva - 1 BV-5303
description: Parking next to the municipal swimming pool. Close to the urban center, bakeries, shops... Perfect place to start excursions to Montseny.

title: (08518) Santa Maria d'Oló - B-670
description: Quiet, fairly level. Wide access road.

title: (17406) Viladrau - GI-520
description: Parking without services but with good access and surrounded by nature

title: (17174) La Fàbrega -
description:
Port d'Uria. following the road that goes from Sant Esteve d'en Bas to Rupit. Space next to the road. Parking departure excursions.
During the day the highway transits, especially motorcycles, but at night it is deserted.
No services. 5/6 seats quite level. The rest with chocks.

title: (17176) Girona - 121 Lloc Hostalets Bas
description: Good place to stop to eat, there are no signs prohibiting overnight stays

title: (17405) Espinelves - 16 GV-5441
description: Roadside esplanade, very close to Espinelves. We slept very peacefully and it was perfect to go to the Fir Fair.

title: (17178) Girona - 275 Lloc Sant Privat d'en Bas
title_short: (17178) Girona - 275 Lloc Sant Privat d'en Bas
description: Picnic area where begins a beautiful trek to the “Salt de Sallent”. There is a toilette in the bar. Be aware of the openingtimes, out of the season it's closed with a chain.

title: (17176) -
description: Road that goes to the Can Turó restaurant. No services but quite flat. Space for a large ac or two small ones. The place to turn are problems. Very calm. You have to leave the road that goes up to the parking lot above Salt Sallent and turn left. About 400m. Hidden and we have spent the night calm. There is no sign of prohibition and the restaurant workers passed by and said nothing to us. It does not bother the circulation. Good place for hiking.

title: (17406) Viladrau - 5 Avinguda Verdaguer Jacint
description: Parking day and night, does not put any prohibited sign and the police have not seen it inconvenient.

title: (17174) San Felíu de Pallarols - 42 C-153
description: Health sanctuary car park. No services.

title: (08178) Collsuspina - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking. In principle, you can do the night without anyone bothering you. It's right next to a hermit. About 15 minutes from the birth of the River Congost. Very quiet and beautiful view of Pla de Vic

title: (08587) Alpens - BP-4654
description: It is good for a night out, although it is very close to the road.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Viladrau
title: (17406) Área de Autocaravanas Viladrau
description: Fairy tale place, small village with all services, it seems to have gone back in time! The motorhome area is fantastic, loading and unloading (grey water and toilets), electricity and WiFi, separate collection and can be paid remotely via QR-code. There is a forest in front, where in the morning the children from the neighboring school come to play accompanied by their teachers. In the center, a few hundred meters away, between hills and alleys, is the central square with its bars, restaurants and typical shops of the region.

title: (17176) Vall den Bas - 53 Diseminado Despoblado
description: Good motorhome area. Free parking and paid services.  Card payment. Free emptying of gray and black water. It is next to the road but little traffic at night. Thanks to the hostel for the initiative!!

title: (17176) Sant Esteve d'en Bas - 29 Avinguda Fernando Laparte
title_short: (17176) Sant Esteve d'en Bas - 29 Avinguda Fernando Laparte
description: Parking on the coast of the soccer camp and in an area of joc per nens. At the coast of the via verda

title: (17406) Viladrau - 1 Carrer Torreventosa
description: SOURCE In front of Gloria Inn

title: (08587) Alpens -
description: Very quiet parking where you can spend the night with our van, with fountain and located under a restaurant if we are too lazy to cook.

title: (08550) -
description: Good place to spend the night, remote, with trees and shade.

title: (08518) Oristà - 9 Carrer Roqueta

title: () Riudaura - Unnamed Road
description: Really nice place. Steep up-hill. But absolutely amazing

title: (08148) L'Estany -
description: Parking without services, suitable for overnight. Quiet eepecialment the capscde setmsna donc rstá next to the public school

title: (17166) Susqueda - Unnamed Road

title: (17166) Susqueda - Camí de Sant Martí
description: Good paved site right next to the dam. Very quiet and beautiful and suitable for any type of vehicle.

title: (17166) Susqueda -
description: Parking for 5 or 6 vehicles, at the foot of the road, with views towards Susqueda. Very quiet and secluded.

title: (08513) Prats de Lluçanès -
description: Motorhome area with toilets and showers, market on Sundays.

title: (08550) Els Hostalets de Balenyà - 20 Carrer Sant Miquel
title_short: (08550) Els Hostalets de Balenyà - 20 Carrer Sant Miquel
description: Day and night parking, very quiet and without services.

title: (08559) El Brull - BV-5301
description: Small parking area not far from a hotel restaurant in El Brull in the Montseny, overlooking the road that crosses the massif. No service.

title: (17515) Vallfogona de Ripollès - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the middle of the forest. Ideal for one night & much less windy than at the top of the mountain.

title: (08559) Brull -
description: Parking for quiet nights, it is better to park in the dirt area, very close to two good restaurants, There is a basketball court and a field for good picnics but no tables. There is an information point of the Montseny Natural Park.

title: (17174) Sant Feliu de Pallerols - 62 Carretera d'Olot

title: (17405) Espinelves - GI 543
description: C 25 Coll de Ravell, gas station and restaurant.

title: (08514) Llusá - BV-4341, s/n
description: Very spacious parking, suitable for any type of vehicle you can spend the night without problem

title: (17166) Susqueda - 21 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: Wonderful place to sleep and spend the day with spectacular views of the distance and the susqueda dam. There are two picnic tables covered by a small roof. 360° view of the mountain range, easily accessible by van.

name: Càmping La Vall d'Hostoles
title: (17174) Càmping La Vall d'Hostoles
description: Family camping, petit i molt tranquil, no hi have pets or sorolls. Molt recommendable if you vols disconnect a few days. To the mateix coast of the via verda Olot/Girona, and also hiking trails. Serveis i dutxa molt nets, fins i all rental and barbecue.

title: (17166) El Far - 73 Barri el Far
description: Parking at the foot of the lighthouse sanctuary, spectacular views, barbecue area, bar and children's playground. We do not know if you can sleep, being a holiday we have stopped in the BUS zone to take some photos from the viewpoint.

title: (08559) El Brull - BV-5301
description: On a small private pitch next to the road. Well out of sight and quiet with an exceptional view. Fires prohibited in summer.

name: Camping Solana de Ter
title: (17500) Camping Solana de Ter
description: Camping behind a hotel, registration at the hotel reception. Clean and functional toilets. Located directly on a river, LIDL within walking distance. Tennis courts and pool available, pools only open in summer

title: (17500) Ripoll -
description: Large esplanade near the road (not much traffic). We have slept one night without problem. There is some shade. It's a bit dirty.

title: (08514) Lluçà - 17 BV-4341
description: Nice for a night

title: (17500) Ripoll - 13 Carrer Vall d'Aran
description: Picnic area with tables and a drinking fountain. Located in front of a gas station, restaurant bar and several supermarkets.

title: (17401) Arbúcies - GI-543
description: Water point just below the highway. We were told by locals it's potable water. You filled yourself a lot of bottles.

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341
description: Perfect flat terrain a few meters after the start of a hiking trail. No passage the night we were there. Very nice view of the surrounding mountains

title: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 10 Plaça de la Vila
title_short: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 10 Plaça de la Vila

title_short: (08550) Els Hostalets de Balenyà - Carrer Sant Jaume
description: Great and quiet to stop, rest or enjoy the surroundings

name: Càmping les Preses Natura
title: (17178) Càmping les Preses Natura
description: Small but cozy campsite, practically full of families with babies. We were very comfortable one night. 7.50 per person and 8.50 per van

title: (08559) El Brull - 58 El Boix
description: Quiet place on a dead end track.

title: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 10 Carrer Puig de Sant Miquel
title_short: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 10 Carrer Puig de Sant Miquel
description: Large parking lot with a bit of unevenness near the sports area

title: (08550) Barcelona - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in nature. It is the large parking lot of a colony house. It also serves as the base of the Via Ferrata de Centelles and hiking trails. In summer, there must be movements with the house of colonies, we spend a quiet night in November. No prohibition signs. pretty flat. Do not leave toilet paper or garbage, and the community will be able to continue enjoying places like this.

title: (17406) - GIV-5201
description: Parking without services at the start of excursions / treekings.

title: (17171) Susqueda - 16 Barri St Marti Sacalm
description: We stayed the night and everything was very quiet, but we did not lift the roof because we were next to a bar and very close to houses.

title: (17172) Las Planas de Hostoles - C-63
description: Free parking where you can spend the night without problem (it has been asked). Easy access, at the foot of the road without being annoying at night. It is the parking of the information point to visit “els gorgs”. 5 minutes from town.

name: Camping Puigsagordi
title: (08540) Camping Puigsagordi
description: Mountain campsite with via ferrata 5 minutes away, paragliding, hiking and mountain biking.

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341
description: A small flat place for a VAN, at the edge of a ridge runway, very beautiful panorama. Tranquility guaranteed, but you should not hesitate to do 3 km of track from the C62 road (GPS 42.0273 / 2.0227), track in fairly good condition. Another small place 100m further on the other side of the track.

title: (08514) Lluçà - BV-4341
description: Quiet and secluded area in the middle of nature. On the same track there are many sidings where to spend the night. We choose to be well leveled. Some vehicles pass that must be neighbors of nearby towns. in the morning some cyclists. Adequate place to rest and disconnect, and do some sport the next morning.

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - Camino J
description: Large open space at the entrance of the village.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 3 Carrer General Fuensanta
description: Gravel parking lot we slept there in our van. A little noisy but for one night it's very bearable

title: (17500) Ripoll - 1 Carrer de Concepció Ducloux
description:
The car park is paved; the pitches are delimited and painted on the ground. The water taps don't work. The toilet cassette is emptied through the hatch at the end of the gray water drainage channel

New area for motorhomes, urban parking, drinking water and emptying of gray and black water. Next to the Dehesa Park with a children's playground and the sports center. shops and supermarkets very close.

title: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 68 N-260a
description:
Starting point for hikes
 2 pitches for a few cars per day for hiking departures
we parked there for the night it is very quiet

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 9 Carrer del Nogue
title_short: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 9 Carrer del Nogue
description: Parking day and night

title: (17178) Les Preses - 38 Carrer la Fageda
description: Ideal to spend the day

title: (08540) Centelles - 27 De C-1413 a Sant Feliu
title_short: (08540) Centelles - 27 De C-1413 a Sant Feliu
description: Esplanada de terra next to the road and the schools. Sense serveis. No hi ha cap cartell that prohibits the overnight stay. Ideal to visit the town.

title: (17172) Les Planes d'Hostoles - 1 Carretera Girona
description: Ground parking next to the soccer field and the greenway. Almost next to the Gorg de Can Poeti and start of one of the roads to the Gorg Molí dels Murris.
